protocol_name: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
protocol_name_html: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
description: This is a method for VSMC isolation from mouse aorta by an explant method adapted from Metz et al (2012).
protocol_affiliation: Laboratory of Gene Function in Animals, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Japan
manuscript_citation: Ikawati M, Kawaichi M, Oka C (2018) Loss of HtrA1 serine protease induces synthetic modulation of aortic vascular smooth muscle cells. PLoS ONE 13(5): e0196628. doi: 10.1371/journal.pone.0196628

authors_list.name: Muthi Ikawati
authors_list.affiliation: Laboratory of Gene Function in Animals, Nara Institute of Science and Technology, Japan

components.data: Mouse preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Sacrifice mouse (10-week old, Balb/c) with an overdose intraperitoneal injection of sodium pentobarbital.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Sacrifice mouse (10-week old, Balb/c) with an overdose intraperitoneal injection of sodium pentobarbital.

components.data: Mouse preparation
components.name: Section

components.data: Dip the mouse into a beaker filled with 70% ethanol, fix into an operation tray, bring into laminar air flow.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Dip the mouse into a beaker filled with 70% ethanol, fix into an operation tray, bring into laminar air flow.

components.data: With sterilized surgical instruments, open the mouse, dissect the thoracic aorta.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: With sterilized surgical instruments, open the mouse, dissect the thoracic aorta.

components.data: Aorta isolation
components.name: Section

components.data: Aorta isolation
components.name: Section

components.data: Wash the aorta in Hank's balanced salt solution (HBSS).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Wash the aorta in Hank's balanced salt solution (HBSS).

components.data: Aorta isolation
components.name: Section

components.data: Keep the aorta in a dish on ice, remove the connective tissue and the adventitia.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Keep the aorta in a dish on ice, remove the connective tissue and the adventitia.

components.data: Aorta isolation
components.name: Section

components.data: Transfer into a new dish with fresh HBSS.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer into a new dish with fresh HBSS.

components.data: Aorta isolation
components.name: Section

components.data: Cut open the aorta longitudinally, remove the endothelial layers by gentle scrape with a sterile cotton swab.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cut open the aorta longitudinally, remove the endothelial layers by gentle scrape with a sterile cotton swab.

components.data: Aorta isolation
components.name: Section

components.data: Cut the aorta into 4 pieces (around 4 mm2 each), wash in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium/Ham’s F12 (DMEM/F12) (Gibco).
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Cut the aorta into 4 pieces (around 4 mm2 each), wash in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium/Ham’s F12 (DMEM/F12) (Gibco).

components.data: Media explant
components.name: Section

components.data: Transfer the aorta pieces into a collagen-coated culture dish (35 mm), press with the luminal side down on the dish.  Spread the aorta out over as large as possible.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Transfer the aorta pieces into a collagen-coated culture dish (35 mm), press with the luminal side down on the dish.  Spread the aorta out over as large as possible.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 9 of Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.protocol_name: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.protocol_name_html: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.annotation: Prepare the collagen-coated culture dish in advance.  Add 1-2 ml collagen, incubate 30-60 minutes at room temperature, rinse with PBS three times, keep the last PBS up to use.
source_data.thread_text: Prepare the collagen-coated culture dish in advance.  Add 1-2 ml collagen, incubate 30-60 minutes at room temperature, rinse with PBS three times, keep the last PBS up to use.
source_data.body: Prepare the collagen-coated culture dish in advance.  Add 1-2 ml collagen, incubate 30-60 minutes at room temperature, rinse with PBS three times, keep the last PBS up to use.

components.data: Media explant
components.name: Section

components.data: Incubate for 5 min in a 37oC, 5% CO2 incubator in a tilting position.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Incubate for 5 min in a 37oC, 5% CO2 incubator in a tilting position.

components.data: Media explant
components.name: Section

components.data: Check and make sure the media explant attached to the dish. Prolonged the incubation for another 1-3 minutes if necessary.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Check and make sure the media explant attached to the dish. Prolonged the incubation for another 1-3 minutes if necessary.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 11 of Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.protocol_name: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.protocol_name_html: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.annotation: Be careful not to dry the media explant.
source_data.thread_text: Be careful not to dry the media explant.
source_data.body: Be careful not to dry the media explant.

components.data: Media explant
components.name: Section

components.data: Very slowly add fresh medium supplemented with 20% fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Sigma) and antibiotics (70 mg/ ml penicillin and 50 mg/ml streptomycin) it just covers the aorta.  Start with 100 μl up to 500 μl.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Very slowly add fresh medium supplemented with 20% fetal bovine serum (FBS) (Sigma) and antibiotics (70 mg/ ml penicillin and 50 mg/ml streptomycin) it just covers the aorta.  Start with 100 μl up to 500 μl.

source_data.thread_title: Comment on step 12 of Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.protocol_name: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.protocol_name_html: Vascular smooth muscle cell (VSMC) isolation from mouse aorta
source_data.annotation: Make sure not to disturb the attachment of explants to the dish.
source_data.thread_text: Make sure not to disturb the attachment of explants to the dish.
source_data.body: Make sure not to disturb the attachment of explants to the dish.

components.data: Media explant
components.name: Section

components.data: Place the dish in the incubator and left undisturbed for 4 days.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Place the dish in the incubator and left undisturbed for 4 days.

components.data: Media explant
components.name: Section

components.data: At day 5, add fresh medium and then change every 3 days. Observe the cells that had migrated from the medial explant under a microscope when changing medium.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: At day 5, add fresh medium and then change every 3 days. Observe the cells that had migrated from the medial explant under a microscope when changing medium.

components.data: Culture of VSMCs
components.name: Section

components.data: When the migrated cells from media explants are confluent, harvest with trypsinization.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: When the migrated cells from media explants are confluent, harvest with trypsinization.

components.data: Culture of VSMCs
components.name: Section

components.data: Count the cells and pool cells from media explants from 3 mice into one dish (0.5-1x105 cells/35 mm dish), culture in 10%FBS/DMEM/F12 (complete medium) as needed thereafter for experiments. This is passage 1.
components.name: Description

source_data.description: Count the cells and pool cells from media explants from 3 mice into one dish (0.5-1x105 cells/35 mm dish), culture in 10%FBS/DMEM/F12 (complete medium) as needed thereafter for experiments. This is passage 1.
